column4: Here's my question again in case anyone missed it : Can anybody tell me how I can check what file System->Administration->Synaptic points at because it wont run Synaptic unless I go to a prompt.
in the menu, right click the menu item and choose Properties?
I don't have a properties menu when I right-click it.
eek. i think it's just that gtksu-thing command followed by synaptic.
